channel.title: Bombshell
channel.description:
Do you guys remember Gearbox sue Interceptor Entertainment and 3D Realms for the unauthorized use of Duke Nukem license? Well it turn's out they doesn't get the Duke Nukem license, instead they just replaces him with a chick:
[img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell.png[/img] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjsyXnqHOhA']FULL TRAILER[/url] [quote] From the creators of 2013’s Rise of the Triad comes Bombshell, an isometric action role-playing game for PC and PlayStation 4. Bomb Disposal Specialist turned mercenary for hire, Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison must strong-arm her away across 4 planets in an Unreal Engine-powered galatic adventure to rescue the president from an apocalyptic alien threat. With out-of-this-world enemies, a never-before-seen arsenal of devastating weaponry and a host of genre-crossing mechanics, Bombshell is set to blow you away. [/quote]
[quote] [align=center][b]KEY FEATURES[/b][/SIZE] [b]History in the Breaking[/b] Be part of Bombshell’s debut as she fights to save her president and her people from a maniac’s mechanical monstrosity.
[b]Brave New Worlds[/b] Traverse the dying world of Kyrron as it’s consumed by its neighboring sun, discover the secrets of a civilization frozen in time on the distant world of Zeroth and travel to the epitome of technology -- a villain’s vision which threatens to consume all that exists.
[b]Robot-Armed and Dangerous[/b] Shell, shock and shatter your way through vicious, bloodthirsty predators, an augmented alien species, and the remnants of an ancient race re-animated, with more than 10 weaponized arm modifications.
[b]Isometric Ingenuity[/b] Brilliantly brutal top-down shooting layered with classic role-playing mechanics, including experience points, upgrades, side quests, and non-linear levels.
[b]Heavy Handed[/b] Fierce finishing moves and interactive environments make Bombshell as dynamic as she is deadly.
[b]What Are You Lookin’ At?[/b] Yeah, she has a metal arm. Deal with it.[/align] [/quote] Here some screenshots from this game. [quote] [COLOR='Black']Recognize this area of of this first screenshot? [img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell_may_01.jpg[/img]
[img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell_may_02.jpg[/img]
[img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell_may_03.jpg[/img]
[img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell_may_04.jpg[/img]
[img]https://alloutofgum.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/static/img/bombshell_may_05.jpg[/img] [/quote] For more, you can visit this website: [url='https://www.nogumneeded.com/']https://www.nogumneeded.com/[/url]
So what's your thoughts on this guys?

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
Well, I’m not gonna judge the game on the reveal trailer. A bad trailer does not make a bad game.

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell

item.description:
Sadly, it seems anything new that’s Duke Nukem, or related, is substandard.

Read full topic

pretty sick of the baywatch bodytype being present on literally every female character

item.title: Bombshell

Yeah, and gotta love how they changed EDF to GDF.

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Teaser was pretty bad, graphics don’t look bad though, and I like the armored alien designs in that screen (though they seem to be tweaks of Duke Nukem aliens given this was a Duke game before the legal issues popped up)

Hate her hair though

EDIT:

lol you can literally see the Duke Nukem Ripper chaingun in the soldiers hands in the screens

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
I am pretty excited about this because I knew about Bombshell as a cut sidekick from Duke Nukem Forever. To see her getting her own game (even her own IP) is awesome for me.

Her design looks pretty badass to me.

Maxey:

I actually laughed at the dislikes.

edit: the teaser trailer started quite good but it got worse as it went on. You can really see the low budget, specially in the lack of mo-capped animations.

Yeah, it could easily have been cut down a bit and it would’ve done so much for it. I did enjoy her design though.

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
I actually like her design, laugh or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
rexcellent to see a violent female protagonist and female prez in the same game.

Her design looks like it was drawn by a teenage boy in 1997, though. Aside from that it looks like fun

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Name: Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison
Age: Classified
Likes: Kicking ass, motorcycles, kicking ass on motor cycles
Dislikes: Bubble gum, sunglasses, blonde hair

I actually laughed at the dislikes.

edit: the teaser trailer started quite good but it got worse as it went on. You can really see the low budget, specially in the lack of mo-capped animations.

Read full topic

item.title: Bombshell
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
Do you guys remember Gearbox sue Interceptor Entertainment and 3D Realms for the unauthorized use of Duke Nukem license?
Well it turn’s out they doesn’t get the Duke Nukem license, instead they just replaces him with a chick:


FULL TRAILER

From the creators of 2013’s Rise of the Triad comes Bombshell, an isometric action role-playing game for PC and PlayStation 4. Bomb Disposal Specialist turned mercenary for hire, Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison must strong-arm her away across 4 planets in an Unreal Engine-powered galatic adventure to rescue the president from an apocalyptic alien threat. With out-of-this-world enemies, a never-before-seen arsenal of devastating weaponry and a host of genre-crossing mechanics, Bombshell is set to blow you away.

[align=center]KEY FEATURES[/SIZE]
History in the Breaking
Be part of Bombshell’s debut as she fights to save her president and her people from a maniac’s mechanical monstrosity.

Brave New Worlds
Traverse the dying world of Kyrron as it’s consumed by its neighboring sun, discover the secrets of a civilization frozen in time on the distant world of Zeroth and travel to the epitome of technology – a villain’s vision which threatens to consume all that exists.

Robot-Armed and Dangerous
Shell, shock and shatter your way through vicious, bloodthirsty predators, an augmented alien species, and the remnants of an ancient race re-animated, with more than 10 weaponized arm modifications.

Isometric Ingenuity
Brilliantly brutal top-down shooting layered with classic role-playing mechanics, including experience points, upgrades, side quests, and non-linear levels.

Heavy Handed
Fierce finishing moves and interactive environments make Bombshell as dynamic as she is deadly.

What Are You Lookin’ At?
Yeah, she has a metal arm. Deal with it.[/align]

Here some screenshots from this game.

[COLOR=‘Black’]Recognize this area of of this first screenshot?

For more, you can visit this website: https://www.nogumneeded.com/

So what’s your thoughts on this guys?

Read full topic
